meanings.definition: To represent in a picture or pictorial form.
meanings.sent1: She picturizes her favorite memories in a photo album.
meanings.sent2: The artist picturizes the beautiful landscape on canvas.
meanings.sent3: He picturizes his dream house with a garden and a swing.
meanings.sent4: Her words picturize a world of magic and wonder.
meanings.sent5: The movie picturizes the historical event with great detail.

meanings.definition: To visualize or imagine something in a visual way.
meanings.sent1: The child picturizes a dragon flying in the sky.
meanings.sent2: When I close my eyes, I can picturize the beach and the waves.
meanings.sent3: He picturizes himself as a superhero saving the day.
meanings.sent4: Her story picturizes a journey through time and space.
meanings.sent5: The book picturizes a world where animals can talk.
